page.title: 01North Bransholme and Wawne
page.content:
The twelve squares are split E_W into two contrasting equal part. To the North is the village of{Wawne and its surrounding farms, while the South is the northern part of the vast new housing estate of{Bransholme.
Wawne is now very much a 'dormitory' village for Hull and nearby Beverley and lies about six miles from both.
Bransholme has been built over the last{20 years}to house about{31,000 people from other parts of{Hull. {North Bransholme}houses about{5,000} people forming approximately a sixth of the whole estate.
